title: [BUG] TSFresh bugs and issues compilation
body:
Going through the issues, we have 8 TSFresh related ones open currently. Some of these are possibly outdated or could be checked off easily.

- [x] https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/3526
- [x] https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/2637
- [x] https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/2073
- [x] https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/1824
- [x] https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/1484
- [x] https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/1478
- [x] https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/1289
- [x] https://github.com/sktime/sktime/issues/397

There are two TSFresh estimators which share a base class and both need improving: `TSFreshFeatureExtractor` and `TSFreshRelevantFeatureExtractor`. The following are some tasks which can be completed to solve these issues and improve the estimators:

- [x] Verify current handling of unequal length data for both estimators. Fix any issues that arise, the current internal datatype is nested univariate dataframes, which can handle unequal length datasets (397).
- [x] Verify if the 1289 RuntimeError still happens outside a main method. Perhaps add a warning to docs if it does, not much to fix with this one pretty sure.
- [x] Verify if 1478 and 1484 are still issues, try relaxing `statsmodels` upper bound.
- [x] Verify if 2637 still relevant to TSFresh specifically.
- [x] Try to reproduce the `impute_function` bug reported in 1824, fix if it can be reproduced else close. 
- [x] Write docstring for `TSFreshFeatureExtractor` (2073 and 3526).
- [x] Write docstring for `TSFreshRelevantFeatureExtractor` (2073 and 3526).
- [x] Verify that a parameter that allows the user to specify the features they would like to extract exists and is functioning (3526).
- [x] Clearer parameters for both estimators (3526).
- [x] Implement `get_test_params` methods for `TSFreshFeatureExtractor` (3526).
- [x] Implement `get_test_params` methods for `TSFreshRelevantFeatureExtractor` (3526).
- [x] Add `fit_transform` method to `TSFreshRelevantFeatureExtractor`
